head.supplied: 22 May 1872 ¶ ¶ [I assure you gentlemen I have supplied none of my private friends with the Melbourne plants excepting about 100 Economic plants which Baron von Mueller specially instructed me to dis...

div.p: Phillip Doran to Castlemaine Borough Council
Unit 53, VPRS 575 Borough of Castlemaine sundry records, Public Record Office, Victoria.

[I assure you gentlemen I have supplied none of my private friends with the Melbourne plants excepting about 100 Economic plants which Baron von Mueller specially instructed me to distribute in the district [...]

The last time I was in Town I obtained from Baron von Mueller some 600 plants for the Botanical, 500 for the Hospital and about 300 for the Asylum, and the selecting, labeling, packing and carting &c of these occupied my time fully from the time I arrived until the time of my return. Instead of been a pleasure trip tome as insinuated by Cr Greenhill I was considerably out of pocket.]
